What is the format of the result returned by the `getbestblockhash` command?
The result returned by the `getbestblockhash` command is a string representing the block hash in hexadecimal encoding.

getbestblockhash

Returns the hash of the best (tip) block in the longest block chain.

Result
"hex"   (string) the block hash hex encoded

Examples
> verus getbestblockhash 
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getbestblockhash", "params": [] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
